title: feat: logo cycles themes + tokenize tooltip backgrounds
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Technicolor Logo
gist.blurb: Click the logo to spin the color wheel! We've turned the header into a theme-switching Easter egg.
gist.summary: Clicking the site logo now cycles through visual theme presets and reveals the theme creator, while the desktop header has been streamlined into a single row.
gist.impact: Users get a cleaner interface and a fun, instant way to customize the site's look without navigating menus.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee acting as a painter/designer. The concept is 'changing colors'. She is tapping the logo and the world changes color.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a magical paintbrush, tapping a glowing logo that shifts the colors of the room. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'COLORS'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
